original_text: So now the lion has roared! Everyone should be afraid! The Lord God has spoken, so his prophets must tell his message.
korean_text: 사자가 부르짖은즉 누가 두려워하지 아니하겠느냐 주 여호와께서 말씀하신즉 누가 예언하지 아니하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: So now the lion has roared!
so his prophets must tell his message.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 예언자들은 그의 메시지를 전해야 한다.
